GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
macvlan: enforce a consistent minimal mtu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit e929ec98c0c3b10d9c07f3776df0c1a02d7a763e, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit 91572088e3fdbf4fe31cf397926d8b890fdb3237. For more details please see the references link.
